MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY6 postcode area of Glenrothes. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2.15pm to make repairs to an underground cable damaged by a 3rd party outside 43 Primlaws Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.44pm on 26th October 2020.
